description: Get the current time anywhere and convert times across time zones. Plan meetings with confidence by comparing regions instantly. Automatically use your local timezone when needed.

tools.name: get_current_time
tools.description: Get current time in a specific timezones

timezone.description: IANA timezone name (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London'). Use 'Etc/UTC' as local timezone if no timezone provided by the user.

source_timezone.description: Source IANA timezone name (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London'). Use 'Etc/UTC' as local timezone if no source timezone provided by the user.

target_timezone.description: Target IANA timezone name (e.g., 'Asia/Tokyo', 'America/San_Francisco'). Use 'Etc/UTC' as local timezone if no target timezone provided by the user.
